title: Text Message Notification When Headphones connected
content:
Hi All,
Is there a way to get the text message notification sound to play through the main device speakers when blutooth headphones are connected? The ringtone will sound through the main speakers when a call is coming in, but not the text message sound.
I use  my headphones at work and they are in and out of my ears all shift depending on what I am doing, and I have missed a text message because my earbuds where out when it came through. It's not practical to keep pulling out my phone to check for texts.

Thanks, for your help.
